mapper.update: UPDATE product SET PRODUCT_STOCK = GREATEST(0, PRODUCT_STOCK - #{orderCount}), PRODUCT_SALE_STATUS = IF(GREATEST(0, PRODUCT_STOCK - #{orderCount}) = 0, '품절', PRODUCT_SALE_STATUS) WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_STOCK FROM product WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId};

SELECT p.PRODUCT_ID, p.CATEGORY_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, i1.IMAGE_URL, i1.IMAGE_ID, IFNULL(( SELECT IF(l.LIKE_ID IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM likes l WHERE l.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID AND l.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo}), 0) AS liked
FROM product p JOIN image i1 ON i1.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN likes l ON l.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID
AND p.CATEGORY_ID = (SELECT CATEGORY_ID FROM category WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = #{category})
AND p.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCond}, '%')
AND p.PRODUCT_SALE_STATUS = '판매중'
AND i1.IMAGE_ID = ( SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID )
ORDER BY p.PRODUCT_ID DESC;

SELECT p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, 1, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, p.PRODUCT_SALE_STATUS, i1.IMAGE_URL, i1.IMAGE_ID FROM product p JOIN image i1 ON i1.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE p.PRODUCT_SALE_STATUS = '판매중' AND i1.IMAGE_ID = ( SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID ) AND p.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, p.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, p.PRODUCT_STOCK, i1.IMAGE_URL, i1.IMAGE_ID, IFNULL(( SELECT IF(l.LIKE_ID IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM likes l WHERE l.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID AND l.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo}), 0) AS liked
FROM product p JOIN image i1 ON i1.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN likes l ON l.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID AND l.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo} WHERE p.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND i1.IMAGE_ID = ( SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID )
